sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" const Profile = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState("profile") const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState({ firstName: "Marie", lastName: "Dupont", email: "marie.dupont@email.com", phone: "06 12 34 56 78", bio: "Passionnée de voyages et de rencontres, je propose régulièrement des trajets entre Paris et Lyon.", car: "Renault Clio 2020", rating: 4.8, totalRides: 25, }) const myRides = [ { id: 1, from: "Paris", to: "Lyon", date: "2024-01-20", time: "08:00", status: "upcoming", passengers: 2, }, { id: 2, from: "Lyon", to: "Paris", date: "2024-01-15", time: "18:00", status: "completed", passengers: 3, }, ] const handleInputChange = (e) => { setUserInfo({ ...userInfo, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() alert("Profil mis à jour avec succès !") } return (
{userInfo.firstName} {userInfo.lastName}
{"★".repeat(Math.floor(userInfo.rating))} ({userInfo.rating})

{userInfo.totalRides} trajets effectués

{activeTab === "profile" && (

Informations personnelles

)} {activeTab === "rides" && (

Mes Trajets

Nouveau trajet
{myRides.map((ride) => (
{ride.from} → {ride.to}
{ride.date} à {ride.time}
{ride.passengers} passager(s)
{ride.status === "upcoming" ? "À venir" : "Terminé"}
))}
)} {activeTab === "bookings" && (

Mes Réservations

Aucune réservation pour le moment.

)} {activeTab === "settings" && (

Paramètres

Notifications
Confidentialité
)}
) } export default Profile
